hakubishin

クラス CardGameObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • hakubishin.CardGameObserver

  • public class CardGameObserver
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the core of card game API. This have a Ruler object and CardPlayField object, and controll those object as a super visor.

    • コンストラクタのサマリー

      コンストラクタ 
      コンストラクタと説明
      CardGameObserver() 

    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド concreteメソッド

      void fire(Card card)
      This method will be called by Card objects when they clicked.

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • CardGameObserver

        public CardGameObserver()

    • メソッドの詳細

      • init

        public void init()

      • punishCard

        public void punishCard(java.lang.String name)
        This method delete a card which is in cardStock.
        パラメータ:
        name - A card you want to delete must be describe as a String object. If there's a card which has same value with this param, the card send to cardsStock.

      • setRuler

        public void setRuler(Ruler ruler)

      • createPlayer

        public void createPlayer(java.lang.String name,
                         boolean isShowable)

      • fire

        public void fire(Card card)
        This method will be called by Card objects when they clicked. Then this call Ruler's "cardSelected(card". This just conduct as a repeater between Card and Ruler.
        パラメータ:
        card - Card stands for the card which posed event

      • provideCards

        public int provideCards(int number,
                        int playerIndex,
                        boolean state)
        Providing cards to the players from cardStock which is hold all cards before a game, just like dealer
        パラメータ:
        number - How many cards do you want to provide
        playerIndex - Index number of players which is unique
        state - Card's state, wheather front or back
        戻り値:
        Total number of sended cards

      • sendCommand

        public void sendCommand(int key)
        This method is used as a relay by CardPlayField to trigger Ruler's methods.
        パラメータ:
        key - This method can trigger some Ruler's methods which will be seleted by this key value.

      • sendNumberCommand

        public void sendNumberCommand(int number)
        There are two ways for CardPlayField to convey information to Ruler Objects This is the one, which can send a integer.
        パラメータ:
        number - This parameter is used as various information which transmits Ruler object.

      • sendCard

        public boolean sendCard(Card card,
                        CardHub origin,
                        CardHub destination)
        パラメータ:
        card - A card which is sending from origin to destination.
        origin - Origin is the player which had the card.
        destination - Destination is the player which will have the card.
        戻り値:
        If this process is succeed, this method will return true.
